remarks: The evaluation of a curried function by a one-arg function is jointly continuous.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Mar-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)
statement:

cnmptk1p.c $e |- ( y = B -> A = C ) $.
